name.ALLOW_ADIC_ORDE: Allow to open if an open order already exists with the same signal.
name.TYPE_CONT_FRACT: Find last candles or fractal num.
name.ALLOW_INV_ORDER: Allow to open if a reverse order has already been opened.
name.fijarNivel: Choose this option to pin the levels obtained when opening the order
name.MM_CROSS_UP_MA: Moving average over low moving average for;
name.MM_CROSS_DOWN_M: Fast moving average below low moving average for

description.CALC_MODE: Select calculation mode for exit level.
description.PERIOD_MM_A: Choose the number of periods of the fast moving average.
description.PERIOD_MM_B: Choose the number of periods of the slow moving average.
description.TYPE_MM_R: Choose the type of average for the fast moving average.
description.RSI_PERIOD: Choose the number of periods for the RSI.
description.PIPS_NUM: Choose the number of points for the profit (10points = 1pip).
Choose the number of points for the losses (10points = 1pip).
description.HOUR_START: Choose the start time of the time filter in the format hour:minute.
description.HOUR_FINISH: Choose the finish time of the time filter in the format hour:minute.
description.TF: Choose the Timeframe of the element(Actual: use the selected timeframe).
description.SUPP_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the level of support.
description.RESIST_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the level of resistence.
description.NUM_CANDLES: Choose the number of candles to considerate by the element.
description.LOW_HL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the level of maximums.
description.HIGH_HL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the level of minimums.
description.PIPS_MARGIN: Choose the number of points of margin (10points = 1pip).
description.PIPS_SPREAD: Choose the points of the spread filter (10points = 1pip).
description.VOLUMEN: Define the volume for the orders of this rule.
description.ALERT_MT4: Choose this option if you want to recieve an alert in the MT4.
description.ALERT: Define the text of the alert.
description.STOP_LOSS: Choose the points of the Stop loss in points (10points = 1pip) (0 = without Stop Loss).
description.QUANTITY_CLOSE: Define the percentage of close of the order. 100% for a total close.
description.TAKE_PROFIT: Choose the points of Take Profit in points (10points = 1pip) (0 = without Take Profit).
description.PORC_TP: Choose the target percentage of the condition regarding the Take Profit (does not apply in orders without Take Profit).
description.SOBRECOMP: Choose the overbought level of the RSI
description.SOBREVENT: Choose the oversold level of the RSI
description.TIPO_SIGNAL_RSI: Choose the type of signal of the RSI. When entering: When it enters overbought/oversold. When exiting: When it exits overbought/oversold.
description.MM_CROSS_UP_MA: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the signal bullish cross
description.MM_CROSS_DOWN_M: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the signal bearish cross
description.SHOOT_SIGNAL: Choose the type of signal. Fliter: while the signal is produced / Shot: when the signal is produced.
description.PERIOD_MM_A: Choose the number of periods for the moving average.
description.TYPE_MM: Choose the type of average for you moving average.
description.MM_CROSS_UP_1MA: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for a bullish signal.
description.MM_CROSS_DOWN_1: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for a bearish signal.
description.PORC_SL: Choose the target percentage of the condition regarding the Stop Loss (does not apply to orders without Stop Loss).
description.DIST_PIPS_TP: Choose the distance to the Take Profit in points (10points = 1pip).
description.DIST_PIPS_SL: Choose the distance to the Stop Loss in points (10points = 1pip).
description.LOSS_TARGET: Choose the amount of loss in cash of all the orders.
description.PROFIT_TARGET: Choose the amount of profit in cash of all the orders.
description.MORE_LESS: Choose the type of comparation. Higher or equal: when the number of orders is higher or equal than X. Lower: When the number of orders is lower than X.
description.TYPE_FILTER: Choose if you want to filter by orders at the same time (if it is on purchases, apply on purchases) or opposite (if it is on purhcases, apply on sales) and the other way around.
description.ALLOW_ADIC_ORDE: Choose this option if you want to allow opening orders of the same type (open purchases if there are already purchases and the other way around).
description.TYPE_READ: Choose the type of reading of the validation. Tick: at every tick of the market. Candle close: each time that a candle ends.
description.ALERT_MOVIL: Choose this option if you want to recieve an alert in the app of MT4 for mobile.
description.ALERT_MAIL: Choose this option if you want to recieve an alert in your email.
description.ALLOW_D1: Choose to activate the filter on Monday.
description.ALLOW_D2: Choose to activate the filter on Tuesday.
description.ALLOW_D3: Choose to activate the filter on Wednesday.
description.ALLOW_D4: Choose to activate the filter on Thursday.
description.ALLOW_D5: Choose to activate the filter on Friday.
description.ALLOW_D6: Choose to activate the filter on Saturday.
description.ALLOW_D7: Choose to activate the filter on Sunday.
description.HOUR: Choose the fixed hour to apply, in format hour:minute.
description.TYPE_CONT_FRACT: Choose the type of counter. Fractal: considering the last X fractals. Candles: considering the fractals of the last X candles.
description.NUM_ULT: Choose the number of candles or fractals to consider.
description.MAX_FOR_F: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the biggest upper fractal.
description.LOW_FOR_F: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the smallest lower fractal.
description.ADR1: Choose the price of the ADR (level 1).
description.ADR2: Choose the price of the ADR (level 2).
description.ADR3: Choose the price of the ADR (level 3).
description.MAX_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the maximum level.
description.LOW_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the minimum level.
description.SOBRECOMP_TYP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the overbought signal.
description.SOBREVENT_TYP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the oversold signal.
description.FAST_EMA: Choose the period of Value of the MACD.
description.SLOW_EMA: Choose the period of Signal of the MACD.
description.MACD_SMA: Choose the period of Histogram of the MACD.
description.CROSS_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bullish signal.
description.CROSS_DOWN: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bearish signal.
description.ADX_PER: Choose the number of periods for the ADX.
description.LEVEL_ACT: Select the cross level for ADX.
description.CROSS_UP: Select signal type when + DI indicator is higher than -DI.
description.CROSS_DOWN: Select signal when + DI indicator is lower than -DI.
description.FDI_PER: Choose the number of periods of the indicator FDI.
description.FDI_LVL: Choose the level of FDI to apply.
description.TIPO_SIGNAL_FDI: Choose the zone of signal: above the level or below the level.
description.ATR_PER: Choose the period of the indicator ATR.
description.ATF_FACT: Choose the number of times of the actual candle regarding the ATR.
description.STOCH_K: Choose the value of Stochastic K.
description.STOCH_D: Choose the value of Stochastic D.
description.STOCH_SLOW: Choose the slowdown value of Stochastic.
description.FILTER_ST: Choose the type of filter. Level: When it is in the levels. Cross: When the lines cross. Cross in level: When the cross is produced considering the levels.
description.CROSS_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bullish cross.
description.CROSS_DOWN: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bearish cross.
description.BOLL_PER: Choose the period of the Bollinger.
description.BOLL_DEV: Choose the deviation of the Bollinger.
description.BOLL_ZONE: Choose if you want to apply when exiting (crossing outside) or entering (crossing inside) the Bollinger Bands.
description.BAND_MID: Choose to apply (purchases/sales/both/none) when touching the middle band.
description.CCI_PER: Choose the period of the CCI indicator.
description.CCI_UP: Choose the upper level of the CCI.
description.CCI_DOWN: Choose the lower level of the CCI.
description.CCI_ZONE: Choose the type of condition, when it is inside the range or when it is outside the range.
description.UP_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the upper level.
description.DOWN_FOR: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the lower level.
description.PSAR_PASO: Choose the step of the Parabolic SAR.
description.PSAR_MAX: Choose the max. of the Parabolic SAR.
description.PSAR_ABOVE: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) when the Parabolic SAR is above.
description.PSAR_BELOW: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) when the Parabolic SAR is below.
description.WILL_PER: Choose the number of periods for the Williams indicator.
description.WILL_LVL_UP: Choose the upper level of the Williams indicator.
description.WILL_LVL_DW: Choose the lower level of the Williams indicator.
description.WILL_DW: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the upper level.
description.WILL_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the lower level.
description.WILL_ZONE: Choose if the element will activate when it is inside or outside of the range.
description.COMP_BIGBAR: Choose the type of comparation of the candle regarding the ATR.
description.ALLOW_INV_ORDER: Choose this option if you want to allow opening orders of the opposite type (open purchases if there are already sales and the other way around).
description.APPLY_TO: Choose to apply this condition in a unitary form for each order or when the condition is fulfilled with all the orders.
description.PROFIT: Choose the amount in cash of loss of the order.
description.LOSS: Choose the amount of cash of profit of the order.
description.COMPARE_LOTS: Choose the type of comparation to verify.
description.DEPTH: Choose the depth of the ZigZag indicator (backstep must be lower than depth).
description.DEVIATION: Choose the deviation of the ZigZag indicator.
description.BACKSTEP: Choose the backstep of the ZigZag indicator (backstep must be lower than depth).
description.HIGH_FOR_ZZ: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bullish signal.
description.LOW_FOR_ZZ: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bearish signal.
description.TF: Choose the TimeFrame of the element (Actual: use the selected timeframe).
description.candleNumber: Choose the number of candles to calculate the Fibonacci retracement.
description.FIBO_UP_RETR: Establish operation type for bullish retracement (Retracement after bullish trend).
description.FIBO_DOWN_RETR: Establish type operation for bearish recovery (Recovery after beaish trend).
description.TYPE_MM_L: Choose the average type for the fast moving average.
description.COMP_SPREAD: Choose the number of pounts for the spred filter (10points=1pip).
description.PORCENTAGE: Choose the % of the account balance to destinate to the margin of the order.
description.CROSS_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the upward cross.
description.CROSS_DOWN: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the downward cross.
description.CROSS_UP_RAUL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the upward cross.
description.CROSS_DOWN_RAUL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the downward cross.
description.CROSS_UP_ETEL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the upward cross.
description.CROSS_DOWN_ETEL: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the downward cross.
description.TYPE_CROSS_STO: Choose the validation of the level inside or outside the range.
description.DIST_BE: Choose the distance in points of the Break Even (10points = 1pip).
description.DIST_ACT_TS: Choose the distance in points in order to activate the Trailing Stop (10points = 1pip).
description.DIST_TS: Choose the distance in points of Trailing Stop (10 points = 1pip).
description.HEIK_ASHI_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) with bullish Heiken Ashi
description.HEIK_ASHI_DOWN: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) with bearish Heiken Ashi
description.OnlyExit: Choose this option to fix the obtained levels when opening the order.
description.BollPeriodT: Choose the period of the Bollinger indicator.
description.BoolDevT: Choose the deviation of the Bollinger indicator.
description.numVelasFueraT: Choose the number of candles that must be outside the Bollinguer to activate the element.
description.BAND_UP_T: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bullish band of the Bollinger.
description.BAND_DOWN_T: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the bearish band of the Bollinger.
description.BAND_MID_T: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the middle band of the Bollinger.
description.TipoOp1MA: Choose the type of operational. Cross: when the price is above/below the average. Pending: if the slope is bullish or bearish.
description.Pendiente: Choose the degree of the slope.
description.SigTypeMACD: Select the MACD signal type. Histogram: when the histogram changes direction. MACD: when the MACD is above / below 0.
description.NUM_CANDLES: Choose number of candles to validate.
description.CANDLES_UP: Choose type of signal (buy or sell) when appears upper signal.
description.CANDLES_DOWN: Choose type of signal (buy or sell) when appears lower signal.
description.TF: Choose timeframe to make read (current means chosen timeframe).
description.PeriodoPSL: Number of candles for the indicator calculus
description.TIPO_SIGNAL_PSL: Signal that will trigger the element
description.FILTRO_INCLINACION: Slope filter of current candle compared to he previous one
description.PUNTOS_INCLINACION: Slope points to consider if slope filter's on.
description.CROSS_UP_3MA_ERIC: Define what'll do the element on a bullish cross.
description.CROSS_DOWN_3MA_ERIC: Define what'll do the element on bearish cross
description.PRICE_APPLY_TO: Price over which to calculate the moving average
description.ZONA_ACCION: Choose the type of signal of the RSI. When entering: When it enters overbought/oversold. When exiting: When it exits overbought/oversold.
description.SOBRECOMPRA_PARA: Define wich action is done when entering to the overbought action zone
description.SOBREVENTA_PARA: Define wich action is done when entering to the overbought action zone
description.PUNTOS_INCL_RSI_FILTER: Slope points to consider if slope filter's on.
description.PEND_POS_FOR: Define wich signals are filtered when the slope is positive.
description.PEND_NEG_FOR: Define wich signals are filtered when the slope is negative.
description.FILTER_UP_3MA_ERIC: Define wich signals are filtered in case of bullish slope.
description.FILTER_DOWN_3MA_ERIC: Define wich signals are filtered in case of bearish slope.
description.margenPipsEnable: If this option is enabled, the signal will happen some time before or after the price enters or exits a certain distance from the moving average.
description.cantidadPipsMargen: Distance from the moving average (in pips) where the element wil signal
description.MM_SENTIDO_MARGEN: Specify whether to signal when the price enters the margin (before crossing the MA) or when it exits.
description.margenPipsEnable: If this option is enabled, the signal will happen some time before or after the fast MA enters or exits a certain distance from the slow MA
description.cantidadPipsMargen: Distance from the slow MA (in pips) where the element wil signal
description.MM_SENTIDO_MARGEN: Specify whether to signal when the fast MA enters the margin (before crossing the slow MA) or when it exits.
description.ICHI_CROSS_UP: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the signal bullish cross
description.ICHI_CROSS_DOWN: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for the signal bearish cross.
description.FCHIK: Allow signals when chickou signal is over/below displaced kijun signal and displaced cloud formed (For bullish/bearish signals).
description.FKUMO: Allow signals when tenkan and kinju signal cross happens over/below the cloud formed for bullish/bearish signals.
description.Periodo: Period over which the Kaufman moving average will be calculated
description.PeriodoEMARapida: Periodo de la media exponencial lenta que se utilizará para calcular la media de Kaufman
description.PeriodoEMALenta: Period of the slow exponential moving average that will be used to calculate the Kaufman AMA
description.margenPipsEnable: Si se activa esta opción, la señal se producirá cuando el precio entre o salga de una distancia de margen de la media movil
description.MM_SENTIDO_MARGEN: Escoge si la señal se dará al entrar al margen (antes de llegar a la media) o al salir
description.num_candles: Number of candles to consider signal
description.brick_size: Brick size (in points) to consider for the formation of candles.
description.RENKO_UP_FOR: Define the operation type after the defined number of bullish candles.
description.RENKO_DOWN_FOR: Define the operation type after the defined number of bearish candles.
description.drawCandles: Select if you want renko candles to be drawn (Only on MT4)
description.RSI_ACTIVAR_EXTREMOS: Cuando se activa el filtro de extremos, estos nuevos niveles deberán ser alcanzados para que el elemento produzca señal al salir de los niveles base.
description.SHOOT_SIGNAL: En modo disparo, el elemento opera en el momento de salir de sobrecompra/venta. En modo filtro, el elemento permitirá operaciones de cualquier tipo siempre que NO esté en sobrecompra ni sobreventa.
description.EXT_SOBRECOMP: Selecciona el nivel extremo de sobrecompra del RSI
description.EXT_SOBREVENT: Selecciona el nivel extremo de sobreventa del RSI
description.periodo: Establish the period for sapucay indicator
description.SAPUCAY_OPTIONS: Price for calculation of the indicator
description.FastMode: If fast mode is enabled it'll be considered just 100 candles for calculation
description.SAPU_UP_FOR: Define the operation type after bullish cross
description.SAPU_DOWN_FOR: Define the operatioon type after bearish cross
description.PIN_DOWN_FOR: Establish action after entering bearish PIN
description.PIN_UP_FOR: Establish action after entering bullish PIN
description.PUNTOS_PROF: Profit points once breakeven level is reached.
description.valorCruce: Maximum cross level to allow signals
description.KONC_IN_CROSS: Define type signal for inside mountain crosses
description.KONC_OUT_CROSS: Define type signals for outside mountain crosses
description.valueRioSup: Minimum river value to allow signals
description.valueRioInf: Maximum river value to allow signals
description.valueBosqueSup: Minimum forest value to allow signals
description.valueBosqueInf: Maximum forest value to allow signals
description.VOL_ZONA: Define the acting zone of the indicator
description.FIBO_invertir: If you enable this option, the signal will be produced when the price recovers by the previously perforated retracement level
description.PRICE_APPLY_TO_ALLI: Price over which to calculate the moving average
description.MM_CROSS_UP_MA: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for bullish moving average
description.MM_CROSS_DOWN_M: Choose to apply (purchases/sales) for bearish moving average
description.TIPO_OP_UP_SW: Define type of signal above level 0
description.TIPO_OP_DW_SW: Define type of signal below level 0
